idinfo.useconst: None provided credit is given to the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission (PFBC) as long as the data is in its original unaltered state. If modifications are made to the data set, users are obligated to describe the types of modifications they have made. Users are not to misrepresent PFBC data sets, nor to imply that changes they (users) have made were approved by the PFBC.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

procstep.procdesc: This layer was created by selecting the appropriate polygons from the National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) water bodies layer and copying into a new layer. Key attributes from the PFBC Fisheries Database records were appended to the lakes to complete the data set. Database records were appended to the lakes to complete the data set.

qhorizpa.horizpae: The layer is based on the 1:24000 National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) water bodies layer.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attr.attrdef: Whether lake is under a fishing special regulation
Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Uniquely identifies the occurrence of each feature
Unique GNIS Name identifier (-9999 used if GNIS Name did not exist)

attr.attrdefs: US Geological Survey and Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission
attr.attrdef: Stream name assigned through the Geogpraphic Names Information System (GNIS) - if one did not exist, PFBC name for stream was used
Area in square kilometers of the lake
Unique identifier composed of 2 parts - the first 8 digits is the sub-basin code, the next 6 digits are randomly assigned, sequential numbers that are unique within a cataloging unit.

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: PFBC lake unique identifier (consists of latitude/longitude of the lake)

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Lake name

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Sub-basin ID where dam is located

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Sub-sub-basin ID where dam is located

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Lake latitude in decimal degrees

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Lake longitude in decimal degrees

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Code for water type

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Receiving water

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Lake area in acres
Whether polygon for lake was derived from NHD
County where lake is located
ID Number used on PFBC Regional and County Guide Maps
County names used on PFBC Regional and County Guide Maps
Waterway name used on PFBC Regional and County Guide Maps
Whether lake was stocked with trout in 2006
Whether lake was stocked with warmwater/coolwater species in 2006
Whether lake was stocked with fingerling lifestage trout in 2007
Whether lake was stocked with trout in 2007
End portion of URL from PFBC web site where stocking information is found - beginning portion is http://www.fish.state.pa.us/stocking/counties/
End portion of URL from PFBC web site where stocking information is found - beginning portion is http://www.fish.state.pa.us/stocking/counties/
Whether lake was stocked with WW/CW species in 2007
Whether lake was stocked with trout in 2008
Whether lake was stocked with warmwater/coolwater species in 2008
Whether lake was stocked with fingerling lifestage trout in 2008
Fishing Special Regulation Name for the Section
URL of web site containing more information about special regulation of the Section
Latitude of Primary Access - used for driving directions in web GIS
Longitude of Primary Access - used for driving directions in web GIS
Name of Primary Access - used for driving directions in web GIS
Whether lake was stocked with trout in 2009
Whether lake was stocked with fingerling sized trout in 2009

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
